newsitem.title: USA: Pinnacle Micro Apex in full production.
newsitem.headline: Pinnacle Micro Apex in full production.

text.p: Pinnacle Micro Inc Tuesday said its Apex 4.6 gigabyte removable 5.25 inch optical disk drive is in full production at the company's Colorado Springs, Colo., manufacturing facility after pilot production last month.
In a statement, the company said the product is shipping against a substantial backlog of orders.

A line of Apex-based optical library systems ranging from 73 gigabytes to 4.8 terabytes is in production and will be available this quarter. These systems are designed for datawarehousing, imaging and government applications, providing on-line centralized storage for networks and giving users random access to mass amounts of data.
